app.enterpriseDescription: Custom solution for larger agricultural operations with advanced needs
app.changeSubscriptionAnswer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, while downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.
app.whatHappensIfIExceedMyLimits: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
app.exceedLimitsAnswer: When you reach your plan limits, you'll be notified and given the option to upgrade or purchase add-ons for additional capacity.
app.doYouOfferAFreeTrial: Do you offer a free trial?
app.freeTrialAnswer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial so you can try our platform before committing to a subscription.
app.volumeDiscountAnswer: Annual plans offer significant savings compared to monthly billing. For larger operations, our Enterprise plan provides custom pricing based on your specific needs.
app.cancelAnswer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period.
app.whatPaymentMethodsDoYouAccept: What payment methods do you accept?
app.paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept all major credit cards including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.

app.freeTrial14Days: Try free for 14 days, cancel anytime
app.howDoesTrialWork: How does the 14-day free trial work?
app.trialExplanation: When you sign up, you'll get full access to all features of your chosen plan for 14 days without being charged. After the trial period ends, your subscription will automatically continue and you'll be billed according to your selected plan. You can cancel anytime during the trial period without being charged.
app.whyCreditCardForTrial: Why do you need my credit card for the free trial?
app.creditCardTrialExplanation: We ask for your payment information to ensure a seamless transition when your trial ends. You won't be charged until your trial period is over, and we'll send you a reminder email before any billing occurs. You can cancel anytime during the trial with no charges.
